title: Released: Command execution exploit for Netgear Orbi routers. Are you patched?
description: The threat is serious enough to warrant a manual check ASAP.

title: Moderna CEO brazenly defends 400% COVID shot price hike, downplays NIH’s role
description: Sen. Sanders accused the company of an "unprecedented level of corporate greed."

title: Counter-Strike 2 will bring a huge technical overhaul to the classic shooter
description: Sub-tick-rate updates seek to end a long-standing struggle for precise gameplay.

title: Animals without a brain still form associative memories
description: Cnidarians like anemones and corals have a nerve net, but that seems to be enough.

title: Journalist plugs in unknown USB drive mailed to him—it exploded in his face
description: Explosives replace malware as the scariest thing a USB stick may hide.

title: FCC chair proposes ban on deceptive “Broadcast TV” and “Regional Sports” fees
description: Comcast and others would have to advertise "all-in" TV price if FCC adopts plan.

title: Ethical AI art generation? Adobe Firefly may be the answer
description: Adobe trained new AI generator on Adobe Stock, licensed content, public domain.

title: VW will support Android Automotive for the “lifetime” of a car—15 years
description: It's the answer to a question we've been pondering for some time.

title: AI platform allegedly bans journalist over fake Trump arrest images
description: Trump family names are also seemingly blocked on AI-imager Midjourney.

title: DirecTV puts Newsmax back on the air after Republicans’ angry protests
description: Newsmax said it now accepts that DirecTV isn't trying to censor conservatives.

title: Beethoven’s genome, sequenced for first time, yields clues on cause of death
description: Composer had genetic predisposition to liver disease and hepatitis B infection.

title: Microsoft says its new developer tools can reduce Xbox’s climate impact
description: Xbox maker says power-saving changes "can be entirely imperceptible to the gamer."

title: “Acropalypse” Android screenshot bug turns into a 0-day Windows vulnerability
description: Unpatched bug can be exploited with modified versions of the Android scripts.

title: An Alfa Romeo bar the badge? We drive the 2024 Dodge Hornet RT plug-in.
description: Dodge has engaged in some badge engineering, but the result is rather good.

title: Feral hogs are the invasive menace you’ve never thought about
description: They destroy crops, uproot landscapes, and spread disease—and not much is stopping them.

title: Relativity Space hopes to live additively ever after with Wednesday’s launch
description: Watch this one because there won't be many Terran 1 launches.

title: Redfall offers a compelling mix of Dishonored, Borderlands, and Buffy
description: Preview: Arkane Studios' first step into an open-world RPG shows a promising start.

title: Making faces: How to train an AI on your face to create silly portraits
description: Follow our step-by-step tutorial to paste your face onto anything your heart desires.
